DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate influence injection speed pain injection lidocaine . It anticipate long injection time lead less pain patient injection . This hypothesis test healthy volunteer , receive three injection amount lidocaine subcutaneously abdomen . The injection give 15 , 30 45 second . After injection , subject ask evaluate pain Visual analog scale ( 0-100 mm ) . The aim study find simple method pain reduction use clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Injection Speed Pain During Administration Local Anaesthetic .
